text: I can't believe I'm in some blobiciously deep trouble.
Lovely Ms. Blob hasn't been talking much to me... Could it be...
If Ms.Blob leaves me I'll never be happy again!
I must think of a plan... Anything! Come on blob brain! Think of a solution!
I suppose dropping out of Blobby Dating School wasn't the wisest choice.
If only there was some sort of way to make a wish come true...
